name: Project POLO
description:
In "Project POLO" you play as a space pilot, lost on an unknown planet after your space station was destroyed ! With your A.I. Vanessa, explore an abandonned facility and try to find a way to escape the planet !

In this game, you create the weapon you want ! You can change separately three parts of your weapon to make an infinite amount of combinaison !

Kill all three boss, unlock new abilities, and discover new places and monsters !

===

This game was made in two months by 4 programmers and 4 graphic designer as our preparatory school project during the end of the year. It was one of the top listed game of the promotion so we really hope you enjoy it !

 (The school website ) (The discord server of Polonium Corp)
